Subject: You're invited to a free Automation in a Day workshop
Body:
Turn outdated into automated
                                                           

Read this email online | View as a webpage

 
 
 

Turn outdated into automated

 

Today's market moves fast, and it's not always easy to find software solutions that meet your unique business requirements.

When you need to quickly build a tailored solution, Microsoft Power Platform is here to help. It enables you to digitize business processes, connect all your applications to share data, and automate and optimize your business processes.

To learn how you can successfully build automation for your business processes, please join us for a free Automation in a Day workshop, where a Microsoft Certified Partner will help you get started on using Power Automate for your business's automation needs.

 

At the end of the day, you’ll be able to:

 
  • Use Power Automate capabilities such as Desktop flows to automate a business process.
  • Take advantage of form processing models developed in AI Builder.
  • Use Cloud flows to orchestrate the execution of your Desktop flows.

Space is limited, so please register today. We hope you can join us, and we look forward to seeing you there.

Register today
 
 
 
 

Questions? Don't hesitate to reach out to pappspartnerevents@microsoft.com.

 
 
 

This email was sent from an unmonitored inbox.

 
Unsubscribe | Privacy Statement
 

Microsoft Corporation, One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052

Subject: Your Microsoft Copilot Studio  trial expires soon—choose how to continue
Body:
Learn how to keep going with Microsoft Copilot Studio.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

Purchase a license or extend your trial to keep building copilot with Microsoft Copilot Studio

Your free trial of Microsoft Copilot Studio will expire on December 22, 2023. Review subscription pricing and purchase a license to continue using your copilot.

See pricing >

Or, if you prefer to extend your trial by 30 days, we’ll email extension instructions on the day your current trial expires.

If you have questions, join our  Microsoft Copilot Studio community forum.

If you have an idea or feedback, please join our Microsoft Copilot Studio idea forum.

Privacy Statement

Subject: Welcome to your new trial environment
Body:
Learn how to get the most out of your trial.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Power Apps

Your trial environment was successfully created

You’ve created a new trial environment, sastrial-spa1. Here are some resources to help you get started:

  1. Learn how to create a canvas app in Power Apps.
  2. Explore existing app building templates.
  3. Connect to your enterprise data to build an app.
  4. Securely store and manage your business data with the Microsoft Dataverse.

If you’re ready to move into a production environment, convert your trial environment any time in the next 30 days.

Go to environment >

If you have questions, please review our FAQs or visit the Power Apps forum.

Privacy Statement
